Uses of Interface
jibe.sdk.client.simple.SimpleApi

Packages that use SimpleApi
jibe.sdk.client.simple Parent package for high-level Jibe SDK API. 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.arena High level API for accessing Arena, e.g. 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.call High level API for peer-to-peer audio (VoIP) 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.contacts High level API for checking the currently available communication capabilities of a remote user. 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.filetransfer High level API for peer-to-peer file sharing 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.myprofile High level API for checking the user's profile details and the current of the connection to the Jibe Cloud and the Jibe Network. 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.session High level API for low-latency, peer-to-peer data connections over RTP/UDP 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.videocall High level API for peer-to-peer audio (VoIP) 
jibe.sdk.client.simple.videosharing High level API for peer-to-peer video sessions 
 

Uses of SimpleApi in jibe.sdk.client.simple
 

Subinterfaces of SimpleApi in jibe.sdk.client.simple
 interface SimpleConnection
          Base interface, implemented by all connection classes in jibe.sdk.client.simple.*.
 

Methods in jibe.sdk.client.simple with parameters of type SimpleApi
 void SimpleApiStateListener.onInitializationFailed(SimpleApi source, JibeServiceListener.ConnectFailedReason reason)
          Initializing the simple connection has failed.
 void SimpleApiStateListener.onInitialized(SimpleApi source)
          The SimpleConnection has established a connection to the Jibe Realtime Engine and is ready to be used.
 void SimpleConnectionStateListener.onStarted(SimpleApi source)
          The connection has been started.
 void SimpleConnectionStateListener.onStartFailed(SimpleApi source, int info)
          The connection could not be started.
 void SimpleConnectionStateListener.onTerminated(SimpleApi source, int info)
          The connection has been terminated.
